name: Flat Earth Balancer
description:
You should build a tiny city, and not flip your unstable flat Earth. 

By clicking the mouse you can put down houses. The houses should be near a road. And you can not put houses on the roads. 

The Earth future is in your hands. 

Press S to turn off music. The audios was made earlier (During the 2nd and 3rd Brackeys game Jam)
